subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Daniel Sturridge scored twice and Luis Suárez got his 23rd goal of the Premier League season as Liverpool ran over Everton, 4-0, in the Merseyside Derby.
snippet: Daniel Sturridge scored twice and Luis Suárez got his 23rd goal of the Premier League season as Liverpool ran over Everton, 4-0, in the Merseyside Derby.
